name: Alchemist (itch) (hoof&horn)
description:
Alchemist is a side-scrolling endless runner about a fledgling alchemist named 'Bilby'.  You're out collecting reagents for your potions and the darkness is starting to settle on the forest...

  • Wander the forest in search of the naturalist way!
  • Collect herbs and animal materials to craft mysterious potions!
  • Become a powerful alchemist peacefully or by slaying forest creatures!

Use W A S D to move

Use Space to jump
